original_text:
May the Lord bless you from Zion,
    he who is the Maker of heaven and earth.
korean_text: 천지를 지으신 여호와께서 시온에서 네게 복을 주실지어다

sentences.original_text: May the Lord bless you from Zion
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와께서 시온에서 너를 복 주시기를 원하며

sentences.original_text: he who is the Maker of heaven and earth
